newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Perez Companc cut to add.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Perez Companc cut to add.

text.p: -- SBC Warburg said on Wednesday it had downgraded its rating for Argentine energy firm Compania Naviera Perez Companc to add from buy.

-- "The company's history of consistent earnings growth may be challenged in 1997. Including extraordinary items, which added Ar$0.08 to earnings per share, Perez Companc is unlikely to beat the Ar$0.43 posted in FY96," analyst Mary Quinn wrote in a report.

-- "Due to the stock's strong performance, a near-term lack of perceived earnings momentum, and a premium valuation, we are tempering our rating on Perez Companc to a less-aggressive ADD. We are increasing our near-term target on the stock to Ar$7.40 from Ar$6.30."
